title: Roger Gates
text:
Roger Gates (died 1430) was a <a href="Dean%20and%20Canons%20of%20Windsor">Canon of Windsor</a> from 1425 to 1430.
Career.
He was educated at <a href="Merton%20College%2C%20Oxford">Merton College, Oxford</a> and became Bursar in 1405, and Junior Proctor 1408 - 1409.
He was appointed:
He was appointed to the first stall in <a href="St%20George%27s%20Chapel%2C%20Windsor%20Castle">St George's Chapel, Windsor Castle</a> in 1425 and held the canonry until 1430.
